#summary Custom drop down list box widget
#labels Type-Widget

= Introduction =
 
The native `<select>` element is a perfectly functional drop-down select box. Unfortunately, it can only be limitedly styled, so is not suitable for applications that require more customizable drop down lists. Therefore, we have introduced the `DropDownListBox`, a fully customizable drop-down list box widget.
